multimonster.converter
Class ConverterPlugIn

java.lang.Object
  multimonster.common.plugin.PlugIn
      multimonster.converter.ConverterPlugIn
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public abstract class ConverterPlugIn
extends PlugIn
implements java.lang.Runnable

This abstract class has to be extended in order to write a plugin for the converter component. The 'work' is done in the run method (Runnable intarface). The plugin works in it's own 'thread'.

Author:
Holger Velke (sihovelk)
